extension.summary: Automatically changes out widgets on the homescreen for a more interesting browsing experience.
Automatically changes out widgets on the homescreen for a more interesting browsing experience.
Automatically changes out widgets on the homescreen for a more interesting browsing experience.
extension.news: 1.0.6 - Fix paths not saving 1.0.5 - Raise required Skin Shortcuts version to 1.0.19 1.0.4 - Allow custom labels - Add removal notifications 1.0.3 - Fix shortcuts and widgets added from context menu 1.0.2 - Fix crash from non-XML files 1.0.1 - Fix crash from non-existent context menu setting 1.0.0 - First stable release
